ComicInfo.Title: Sserpo! the Creature Who Crushed the Earth!; Earth Will Be Lost Tonight!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:35:31. [CVDB177448] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:48:04. [Issue ID 96181]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sserpo! the Creature Who Crushed the Earth!: A growth serum is abandoned and eaten by a lizard, which grows big enough to menace the Earth. The world is only saved when a scientist, the great-grandson of the inventor of the serum, contacts aliens on Jupiter, who use their advanced technology to restore the creature to normal.
Earth Will Be Lost Tonight!: An agent signs a mysterious singer who is an instant hit. The agent finds that the singer is an alien whose next record will help his people conquer Earth. He escapes, and manufactures a scandal to ruin the alienâ€™s record sales.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
